wikipedia_page.main: James Theirs Harrison Lovie (born 19 September 1932) is a Scottish former footballer, who played as a left winger. Lovie began his career in the early 1950s with Dundee United before moving back to hometown club Peterhead, where he had begun his youth career. In 1957, Lovie headed south to join Bury, moving on to Bournemouth and Chesterfield before finishing his career in the lower leagues.
